articles.title: Apple plans to make it easier to text between iPhones and Androids - The Seattle Times
articles.description: Apple plans to adopt a technological standard that will allow text messaging to operate more smoothly between iPhones and Android devices.
articles.content:
In a major reversal, Apple plans to adopt a technological standard next year that will allow text messaging to operate more smoothly between iPhones and Android devices.
